Class Equations

java.lang.Object
KI305.Kozak.Lab5.Equations
public class Equations extends Object
Equations class represents equation tan(x)/cot(x).

    • calculate

      public double calculate(int x) throws CalcException, FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Calculates the value of the expression: tan(x)/cot(x) where x is given in degrees.
      Parameters:
      x - the angle in degrees
      Returns:
      the result of the calculation
      Throws:
      CalcException - if x corresponds to an undefined tangent or cotangent value, or if the calculation results in an illegal or undefined value
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException
